Simplified in your browser 简体字的浏览器显示:蟆

Simplified in Unicode standard 简体字的Unicode标准:U+87C6

Main pronunciation 主要发音: má

Other pronunciations 其它发音: má,mò

Original meaning 本义: Meaning frog or toad.

English senses 英语理解: frog, toad

Usage example 用法举例: 蛤蟆 há má (toad)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 3096

Shuowen 说文解字: 蝦蟆也從虫莫聲

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 蟆 flip-variant 蟇 from insect 虫 chóng and phonetic sun-down 莫 mò C388 蟆<蟇> simp 蟆.

Decomposition notes 字形分解说明 :
(- comp- 蛤蟆).
